H0.text: In which city were the 2009 World Athletic Championships held. Berlin

H1.text: In which city were the 2009 World Athletic Championships held. London

H2.text: In which city were the 2009 World Athletic Championships held. Paris

H3.text: In which city were the 2009 World Athletic Championships held. DEBER

A4.text: The 12th IAAF World Championships in Athletics were held in Berlin, Germany from 15 to 23 August 2009.

A5.text: Berlin was announced the winning bidder by the IAAF on 6 December 2004 beating out bids from Split (Croatia), Valencia (Spain), Brisbane (Australia), Brussels (Belgium), Delhi (India), Casablanca (Morocco) and Daegu (South Korea).
